ref.mixed-citation:
Shi J
,
Wen Z
,
Zhong G
Susceptibility of ferrets, cats, dogs, and other domesticated animals to SARS-coronavirus 2. Science ( 2020) ( Epub ahead of print).

note.p: •• Investigates the susceptibility of ferrets and animals in close contact with humans to SARS-CoV-2 and found that SARS-CoV-2 replicates poorly in dogs, pigs, chickens and ducks, but ferrets and cats are permissive to infection. In addition, cats are susceptible to airborne infection.
